ygData.subject: Bard mailing list
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO, for the benefit of all bards there should be one main bard mailing list.  That way there is one central repository of bardic knowledge. Perhaps the two
ygData.messageBody:
IMO, for the benefit of all bards there should be one main bard mailing
list. That way there is one central repository of bardic knowledge.
Perhaps the two moderators might consider merging the two lists. The two
brewing lists did that a long time ago when EQ first came out and it worked
out well.

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [SMTP:jgs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 10:35 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] level 32 and not sure!
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Greetings!
>
> You might want to subscribe to eq_bards - more traffic than this list.
>
>
